changeSet.sql: create table PLACEMARK ( PLACEMARK_ID int auto_increment primary key, ROUTE_ID INTEGER not null, LONGITUDE DOUBLE, LATITUDE DOUBLE, TIME BIGINT, ROW_TIME TIMESTAMP(26,6) ) ; create table CLIENT ( CLIENT_ID int auto_increment primary key, SURNAME VARCHAR(32), NAME VARCHAR(32), GIVEN_NAME VARCHAR(32), FIO VARCHAR(16), AUTO_ID VARCHAR(16) ) ; create table MANAGER ( MANAGER_ID int auto_increment primary key, SURNAME VARCHAR(32), NAME VARCHAR(32), GIVEN_NAME VARCHAR(32), FIO VARCHAR(16), SEAT VARCHAR(32) ) ; create table ROUTE ( ROUTE_ID int auto_increment primary key, NAME VARCHAR(32) not null, ROUTE_DEVICE VARCHAR(32) )
